content.query:
SELECT
    subcategory
    ,COUNT(*) AS num
    ,CAST(dateTime AS DATE) as [date]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/deltaoptimize/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE CAST(dateTime AS DATE) = '20010101'
GROUP BY subcategory, CAST(dateTime AS DATE);
-- Total size of data scanned is 148 megabytes, Total execution time: 00:00:17.255
